name: defi-llama-api
description: Query DeFi protocol TVL, yields, and chain data via DeFiLlama API.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: defi_llama_api
toolDefinition.description: Query DeFi protocol TVL, yields, and chain data. Actions: get_protocol_tvl (get TVL for a protocol), list_protocols (list all protocols), get_chain_tvl (get historical TVL for a chain), get_yields (get yield/APY data for pools).
